summary: Lexus is Toyota's luxury car brand, sold in over 90 countries. It was created in 1983 and launched in 1989 with the Lexus LS sedan. Since then, they've added various models like sedans, coupes, and SUVs. In 2005, Lexus introduced a hybrid version of the RX crossover and started selling cars in Japan under its own brand. They also launched a performance division called F marque. Most Lexus cars are made in Japan, but some are produced in other countries like Canada. Lexus has been expanding globally and is now sold in many regions, including Southeast Asia and Europe.
title: Lexus
